subdivision_of_building: There are no existing buildings on the site
description: Public realm and highways improvements; alterations to pavement and road layout including provision of pedestrian crossings and pedestrian and accessible access to Sutton Station, alteration to existing cycle store arrangement and provision of paving, landscaping, planting, lighting and other associated works.
